about_the_game:
rAYE continues to contrive various music styles to the ever-changing landscapes of the dungeons. Embellishing Funk Rock, Trap and Future Bass for the opening section, later moving on to sinister Orchestral sounds as players found themselves settled in some of the most mysterious and gut-twisting parts of the dungeons.

This soundtrack contains 19 tracks of game music in 320kbps MP3 format.
